org.epics.pvaccess.client.pvds.util

Class BloomFilter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.epics.pvaccess.client.pvds.util.BloomFilter<T>

  • public class BloomFilter<T>
extends Object
    This class implements a String Bloom filter. Google CityHash64 (seed-less) hash function is being used Read http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bloom_filter for more details.
    Author:
    msekoranja

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(T object)
      See "Less Hashing, Same Performance: Building a Better Bloom Filter" by Adam Kirsch and Michael Mitzenmacher on how to use (enhanced) double hashing on Bloom filters.

      Get filter bit-set.

        public void add(T object)
        See "Less Hashing, Same Performance: Building a Better Bloom Filter" by Adam Kirsch and Michael Mitzenmacher on how to use (enhanced) double hashing on Bloom filters.
